effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Damage calculation always uses the target’s Defense, regardless of this move’s damage class.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Damage calculation always uses the target’s Defense, regardless of this move’s damage class.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Damage calculation always uses the target’s Defense, regardless of this move’s damage class.

short_effect.sun_moon: Inflicts damage based on the target’s Defense, not Special Defense.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts damage based on the target’s Defense, not Special Defense.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts damage based on the target’s Defense, not Special Defense.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user cuts with its long horn. The odd power contained in the horn does physical damage to the target.
